mapper.select: SELECT GB.GBCODE, GB.GBMID, GB.GBTITLE, GB.GBPDCODE, GB.GBCOMMENT, TO_CHAR(GB.GBSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS GBSDATE, TO_CHAR(GB.GBFDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS GBFDATE, GB.GBREGION, PD.PDNAME, PD.PDIMG, PD.PDPRICE FROM GROUPBUY GB, PRODUCT PD WHERE GB.GBPDCODE = PD.PDCODE ORDER BY GBFDATE ASC
SELECT PDTYPE FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY PDTYPE
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PDTYPE = #{pdtype} AND PDSTATE = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUPBUY (GBCODE, GBMID, GBTITLE, GBPDCODE, GBCOMMENT, GBSDATE, GBFDATE, GBREGION) VALUES (#{gbcode}, #{gbmid}, #{gbtitle}, #{gbpdcode}, #{gbcomment}, SYSDATE, #{gbfdate}, #{gbregion})
INSERT INTO GBPEOPLE(GPGBCODE, GPMID, GPAMOUNT, GPPRICE) VALUES(#{gpgbcode}, #{gpmid}, #{gpamount}, #{gpprice})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GBPEOPLE WHERE GPGBCODE = #{gbcode} AND GPMID = #{loginId}
mapper.delete: DELETE GBPEOPLE WHERE GPGBCODE = #{gbcode} AND GPMID = #{loginId}
DELETE CHATROOM WHERE CHGBCODE = #{gbcode} AND CHMID = #{loginId}
